title: LoL on Mac OSX Yosemite v Windows 8.1 (Via Bootcamp) Which one is better?
body: Just wondering which would be better to run league on. Or are they both the same now since there is a native version for each?

replies.body: windows 8.1, at least it's not mac.

Yep, used bootcamp and Windows 8.1 added about 15-20 fps. Recommend this to other LoL players on Mac!
Thanks for your help :)
